text_block_list.text: Huff... Huff... And... goal......hm? What was that on my foot...!? Eeeeeek, did I get bitten by a shark...!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: ――Aaaaahh, aahhhh! T-Trainer-san! Is my- is my leg still attached!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Something on my leg feels weeird! I can't look...! It's weird and slimy... Am I feeling the inside of the shark's mouth!?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Seaweed!? ...Oh, you're right. It's just seaweed... Phewww. I was just jumping to conclusions...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
...Uh, err, sorry about that... 
B-but, um! I met my time! 
......I did, right?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
We were already halfway through summer training camp. 
She may have seemed about the same as ever, but Meisho Doto 
was showing undeniable signs of growth.

N-no, I still have a long way to go...! 
But if, maybe, hypothetically, I do get stronger――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
It'd be all thanks to you, Trainer-san...! 
Thank you so much...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Huuuhhh!? N-no, I'm just stubborn... 
It's really all because you give all the right instructions...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: <size=27>You're the one talented enough to follow those instructions.</size>

text_block_list.text: Huuuuuuuuuuuuh!? N-no, it's really, really all because you're willing to stick things out with me――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: <size=35>No, I just got caught up in your determination.</size>

text_block_list.text:
It looked as if we were just buttering each other up, but I took it 
as an opportunity to point out the good things I'd always thought 
about her. At the end of that long shower of compliments――

――Aagghhhhh, oohhh, oof....! 
P-p-p-p-please, no more... I'm so sorry...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: Hey, you don't need to apologize...

text_block_list.text:
But, if you say any more, I... I'm already at my limit...! 
I've never been complimented so much before... Uughhh...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: ...But, if Trainer-san really, really does believe in me...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: ...I wonder if there's anything I can do in return...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Auughhhhh... I-I'm going to go run agaaaaiiiin!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Wh- Seaweed!? Ahhh, I'm slippiiiiiing!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
With training done, Meisho Doto and I went our separate ways. 
But when I went back to the cabin...
...Doh!? Oooof.... I-I hit my head on the pillar... Owie...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Wha!? 
Oh. I'm okay. Sorry...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Uhhh, well... No, not really... 
Maybe really, kind of, but not...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Whatever it was, it seemed especially hard for her to say out 
loud, so I decided I'd wait for her to work up the courage. 
Once she did――

It, um, might just be nothing but trouble for you... 
And I might drag you into a bad situation, but...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Wait, actually, something or other might go wrong and there 
might be an explosion, or something, and you could maybe get 
caught in the blast――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: It's all right, just keep going.

text_block_list.text:
Well, uh, I... I want to go see the fireworks!! 
S-so――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: ――please, come with me...!!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Quite a few hours passed after her uncharacteristic invitation. 
She'd taken the lead in navigating to the viewing spot, but――
――AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!! Th-the fireworks ar-are already over...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I-I'm sorry... It's all my fault for getting us lost, and almost 
getting dragged off by those owls...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Uhhhh... And even after I asked you to come along, even after we 
finally made it here...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I heard this was an out-of-the-way place where you could still 
see the fireworks really well... 
I did a lot of research about it online, and stuff...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
But in the end, I'm can't stop being my klutzy self. 
I tried too hard and messed up so much...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: I just wanted to make Trainer-san happy...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Huh...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
B-but there aren't any fireworks, you know? 
I made you walk all this way just to watch a normal night sky, 
you know...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
When it comes down to it, all I do is cause trouble. 
I- I'm――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Y-yessss?!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
choice_data_list: <size=38>Thank you for working so hard for my sake.</size>
<size=38>Thank you for working so hard for my sake.</size>

text_block_list.text: ....! Waaaaahhh, Trainer-saaaaan...!
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
She made her true feelings heard, so, in a way, this was time 
well spent. Not seeing the fireworks was a shame, but we could 
go see them another time. I was about to suggest we do――
Hywaaaa!? Ah――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Huh? What? Fireworks...? 
W-why? I thought they were supposed to be over...
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I quickly took out my phone and checked. Apparently, there was 
an accident, so the fireworks were briefly delayed.
choice_data_list: <size=38>Getting lost helped us watch them after all.</size>
<size=38>Getting lost helped us watch them after all.</size>

text_block_list.text:
...! 
You mean... it's because I goofed up...?
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
Wha!? T-that's not what you meant, right!? 
It'd be better if I didn't goof up at allll! ...B-but still――
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text: Ehehhe... Trying too hard was a good thing after all......♪
text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto

text_block_list.text:
I looked at her face, her eyes fixed on the sky. The tears pooled 
in them, shining brilliantly in the fireworks' light――
She seemed like she believed in herself just a little bit more.
